name: Civilization 2D
desc: A school project aiming to see our understanding of the Java language and the use of design patterns. We had to make game like Civilization, with a map, buildings, resources and an economy. The game is made with Java and JavaFX.

name: EcoQuiz
desc: During an event called 'Nuit de l'info' (Night of the info), we had to make a project in 18h. We made a website to help people understanding how we impact the environment with our lifestyle. The website is made with VueJs and Typescript.

name: SnapEdit
desc: A school group project to make a web app to edit images, with a lot of filters and effects. Front is made with VueJs and Typescript and the back is made with Java and SpringBoot.

name: Portfolio
desc: A website to showcase my work and skills. Made with VueJs and Typescript, responsive and accessible.

name: U-Bomb
desc: A bomber like game with a map editor and A* pathfinding AI for monsters, made with Java and JavaFX. First time with POO langage.

name: Polyglot TicTacToe
desc: A side project to show langages I know, for each language there is the time spend, installation steps, tests, a CLI game and a GUI game.

name: LightUp
desc: A project thought the whole year, with two teams of 3 people, we had to make a game following rules and methodologies. All the game is in C, with SDL2 for the GUI. The game has been portated to Android and to the web with WebAssembly.

name: WebSite with Flask
desc: I had already made a website with vanilla HTML and CSS, but i learnt with school how to use Flask, so I made a website with Flask and Jinja. Also I made an API to access university calendar events from my Google Calendar.

name: Bots for a Teamspeak Server
desc: With my friends we had a Teamspeak Server, and I saw that there was an api to access functions of the server, so I made a bot to move AFK people in a channel, and a bot to move people in a channel when they were talking, to assign roles to people.
